message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and potential benefits it can bring to your life.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. My counteroffer would be $850000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $875000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to your life.
I understand your position, Alice. My counteroffer would be $860000.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as high as $860000. I'm willing to make another concession and offer it to you for $880000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to your life.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. My counteroffer would be $870000.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the deadline, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession to try to reach an agreement. I'm offering it to you for $890000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. My counteroffer would be $880000.

I'm disappointed that we're not able to reach an agreement, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession to try to close the deal. I'm offering it to you for $900000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
I'm sorry to hear that, Alice. My final counteroffer would be $890000.
